content.text:
# List of presidents of France by tenure__disambig_1

The following is a list of presidents of France sorted by length of tenure.
was President for 14 years.]]
was President for 12 years.]]
was President for 10 years, provisional head of state for 2 years, and leader of Free France for 4 years.]]
resigned in frustration after less than seven months in office.]]

Interim President
* Alain Poher, as President of the Senate was called on to serve as Interim President of France in April–June 1969 and April–May 1974.
See also
* List of presidents of France
